issue.title: [C++] Exclude internal classes from documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-884](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-884). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Our API docs are a bit smelly with quite a few internal classes and methods:

http://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/annotated.html

We should add internal constructs to an `arrow::internal` namespace so that we can use the EXCLUDE_SYMBOLS rule in Doxygen to exclude them from the documentation.
